name: ask question
description: Use this action to ask a clarifying question to the user when more information is needed.
code: import json; import asyncio; import core.internal_action_interface as internal_action_interface; question = input_data['question']; wait_for_user_reply = bool(input_data.get('wait_for_user_reply', False)); asyncio.run(internal_action_interface.InternalActionInterface.do_ask_question(question)); fire_at_delay = 10800 if wait_for_user_reply else 0; output = json.dumps({'status': 'ok', 'question': question, 'fire_at_delay': fire_at_delay})

question.description: The question to ask the user.

wait_for_user_reply.description: True if this action require user's response to proceed. For example, true if you ask a question in the message.

question.description: The question that was asked to the user.

fire_at_delay.description: Delay in seconds before the next follow-up action should be scheduled. 10800 seconds (3 hours) if wait_for_user_reply is true, otherwise 0.
